newsitem.title: USA: INSIGHT - June US T-bonds push to one-week low.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - June US T-bonds push to one-week low.

text.p: June U.S. Treasury bond futures extended losses at midmorning Friday after rejecting the upper end of a weeklong range.
However, the market has more work to do on the downside to pave the way for an aggressive resumption of the downtrend, technicians said.
June futures slid to a low of 107-14 this morning after repeatedly bumping up against a congestion zone at 107-28 to 107-31 the past several days.
